preqs: Students must have passed BTW1200 or BTG1200 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BTG1200, BTW1200}

description: An overview of conduct that constitutes criminality in the business world. It draws together from the various areas of business law and taxation provisions governing inappropriate conduct within corporate entities, which have the potential to attract criminal and/or other serious sanctions. It discusses the mechanisms for detecting and penalising such offences and the possible penalties.
